name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vercel**. Proficient in implementing responsive design using **TailwindCSS** and crafting intuitive user interfaces with tools like **Figma**. Adept in building and optimizing **AI**-powered applications, including **LLM** integration and **OpenAI** solutions, supporting advanced features such as **Image Generation**, **Context Engineering**, and **Agentic AI**.

Experienced in creating efficient **Data Pipelines**, using advanced databases including **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase**, and skilled in managing **Async Operations** through solid **API** design. Proficient in utilizing **Git** for version control, ensuring seamless collaboration and delivery. With strong expertise in cross-functional development, I bring a robust understanding of UI/UX principles to enhance application performance and user satisfaction. Passionate about leveraging innovative technologies to drive business success.
